name: Aster Risk Guide
landing_text: Welcome to the $(#9966ff)Aster Risk$() guidebook! This tome contains all the knowledge you need to master the power of the $(#aaccff)Moon$() and $(#ffcc66)Stars$().$(br2)Begin your journey by exploring the materials found in the world, then progress to crafting magical equipment and unlocking the secrets of the $(#8844aa)Lunar Realm$().
